PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-20072009-12-10,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectCRTC - Bell / TELUS petitions
PrecisOrder refering back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) Telecom Decision CRTC 2008-117 and Telecom Order 2009-111, requiring the CRTC to conduct broader hearings to examine the implications on investment in advanced telecommunications networks, competition, consumer choice and innovation.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: CRTC - Bell / TELUS petitions
precis: Order refering back to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) Telecom Decision CRTC 2008-117 and Telecom Order 2009-111, requiring the CRTC to conduct broader hearings to examine the implications on investment in advanced telecommunications networks, competition, consumer choice and innovation.
